name: Lightspeed (1990)
description:
Lightspeed (1990) is a simulation game developed by MicroProse Software. It was originally released in 1990. It was published by MicroProse.
Lightspeed (1990) is available on PC.
Andy Hollis and Jeffery L. Briggs produced the game. Andy Hollis, Sandy Petersen and Scott Patterson directed the game. Jeffery L. Briggs, Jim McConkey, Ken Lagace and Scott Patterson scored the game.
